Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Hypotension induced by ATP was accompanied by significant decreases in mean pulmonary arterial pressure ( p less than 0 . 001 ) , central venous pressure ( p less than 0 . 001 ) , left ventricular end - diastolic pressure ( p less than 0 . 001 ) , total peripheral resistance ( p less than 0 . 001 ) , rate pressure product ( p less than 0 . 001 ) , total body oxygen consumption ( p less than 0 . 05 ) , and heart rate ( p less than 0 . 001 ) ; all these variables returned normal within 30 min after ATP was stopped .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease or Condition |
|----------------------|
| Hypotension induced by ATP |

In this paragraph, "hypotension induced by ATP" is the main disease or condition mentioned. The other variables mentioned are not diseases but rather physiological responses to the hypotension. Therefore, only "hypotension induced by ATP" should be included in the table.
